Imports

hmath

Types

StrBlock = seq[string]
RuneSeq = seq[Rune]
RuneBlock = seq[RuneSeq]
ArrSize = object
  width: int
  height: int

ArrRange = object
  a*: int
  b*: int

ArrPos = object
  row*: int
  col*: int

RelPos = enum
  rpLeft, rpRight, rpBottom, rpTop
ArrRect = object
  pos*: ArrPos
  size*: ArrSize

TreePath = seq[int]
Path into heterogenous, int-indexed tree. First element if the path is index of current node, everything else refers to position. So [0] points is a root node, [0, 1] is a second subnode and so on. 
EqCmpProc[T] = proc (x, y: T): bool
ScoreProc[T] = proc (x: T): int
ScoreCmpProc[T] = proc (x, y: T): int

Vars

emptyRune: Rune

Consts

colNoColor = -1
whitespaceRune: Rune = 32
size1x1 = (width: 1, height: 1)
rootTreePath: TreePath = [0]
